T02D1997:193b-1: ma h'a badzra bhee ra ba ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1997:193b-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1997:193b-4: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1997:193b-5: bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D1997:193b-6: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed la //
T02D1997:193b-7: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1997:193b-8: de yi sbyin sreg cho ga bshad //
T02D1997:193b-9: gang yang rgyud rnams thams cad du //
T02D1997:193b-10: sbyin sreg cho ga med pa la //
T02D1997:193b-12: de bas sbyin sreg la 'jug bya ;
T02D1997:193b-13: / de la sbyin sreg gi rim pa ni slob dpon dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa //
T02D1997:193b-16: bla ma la gus pa des dur khrod la sogs
T02D1997:193b-17: pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong bar
T02D1997:193b-18: lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas la sngags kyi bzlas pa
T02D1997:194a-2: thab kyi tshul ni gnyis te /
T02D1997:194a-4: yang na khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu thab bya'o //
T02D1997:194a-5: khyim du thab bya ba ni gru gsum pa rgyar
T02D1997:194a-6: khru gang dpangs su de'i phyed la kha khyer sor
T02D1997:194a-7: gsum pas kun nas bskor ba /
T02D1997:194a-8: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D1997:194a-9: sol bas kha dog nag por byas la /
T02D1997:194a-10: khro bo'i rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1997:194a-11: dri chen dang bong bu dang /
T02D1997:194a-12: rnga mo'i rtug pas byugs pas bsad pa la sogs pa'i las bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1997:194a-13: thab kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1997:194a-15: thab khang du rdzas gzhag pa ni mchod pa'i rdzas me tog nag po dri mi zhim pa dang /
T02D1997:194a-18: me mar chen po'i mar me dang /
T02D1997:194a-20: mi la sogs sha'i lha bshos dang /
T02D1997:194a-23: tshil dang bcas pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa'i chu
T02D1997:194a-24: snod rnams ni rang gi g-yon du gzhag par bya'o
T02D1997:194a-28: rnga mo'i rtug pa dang shing tsher ma can dang /
T02D1997:194a-29: dur khrod kyi yam shing dang /
T02D1997:194a-31: skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas rnams ni g-yas phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1997:194a-33: de nas sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la mchod rdzas dang /
T02D1997:194a-34: sreg rdzas thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya ste //
T02D1997:194a-35: aom hr'i: shtri: aa zhes pas mchod yon lan gsum
T02D1997:194a-36: mam bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas la gzhug
T02D1997:194a-37: par bya'o // de bzhin du aom h'um h'um phat phat ces bya bas bsang gtor bya ba dang ;
T02D1997:194a-38: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza dza zhes bya bas me tog dang /
T02D1997:194a-39: aom hr'i: ha ha he phat phat /
T02D1997:194a-40: ces bya bas bdug spos dang /
T02D1997:194a-41: aom d'ipta lo tsa ni wi kri t'a na na
T02D1997:194a-42: ma h'a aatta ha sa ni d'ipta d'ipt'a ya sv'a
T02D1997:194a-43: h'a / zhes bya bas mar me dang /
T02D1997:194a-44: aom wi kri t'a na na dushta sa tva d'a ma ka ga: ga: dri'o //
T02D1997:194a-45: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba satva da ma ka
T02D1997:194a-46: ma h'a bh'u ta ba ti ai dam ba lim
T02D1997:194a-47: grihna grihn'a pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1997:194a-48: zhes bya bas lha bshos kyi ste /
T02D1997:194a-49: de kho na nyid kyis gtor ma la yang mngon par bsngags la /
T02D1997:194a-50: gong du gsungs pa'i bsang gtor gyis rdzas thams cad dang /
T02D1997:194a-51: thab khung la sgos pa la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D1997:194a-52: rdzas byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1997:194b-0: @194b de nas bud shing dang me blang bar bya ste /
T02D1997:194b-1: bud shing ni ro bsregs pa'i mgal dum mam /
T02D1997:194b-2: shing tsher ma can gyi rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba'o //
T02D1997:194b-7: ba la da ka la sogs pa'o //
T02D1997:194b-8: de la me yang ro bsregs pa'i sa'am /
T02D1997:194b-11: rdo las byung ba yang rung ste /
T02D1997:194b-13: bud shing dang me gnyer ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1997:194b-14: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bsang gtor byas nas me sbar bar bya ste /
T02D1997:194b-15: aom dzva la dzva la h'um h'um phat phat ces pas mngon par bsngags la /
T02D1997:194b-16: 'og tu yang yi ge yam yongs su gyur pa
T02D1997:194b-17: las gzhu lta bus spor bar byed par bsam mo
T02D1997:194b-19: de nas h'um gis thab khung bskyed la /
T02D1997:194b-20: dam tshig gi me lha 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1997:194b-22: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
T02D1997:194b-23: aom a'a: h'um gis 'khor lo dang /
T02D1997:194b-26: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1997:194b-27: khro bo'i me lha shin tu drag cing khro bar byed pa /
T02D1997:194b-28: 'jigs pa dag kyang shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D1997:194b-29: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba 'od zer brgya stong du mas brgyan pa zhal gsum pa /
T02D1997:194b-34: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02D1997:194b-37: phyag g-yon pa rnams la dril bu dang /
T02D1997:194b-39: bgrang phreng rnams 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1997:194b-40: sngags 'dis gnyug mar gnas pa'i me lhe spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D1997:194b-41: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bha'u ta de wa
T02D1997:194b-42: ri shi satva ma aa hu ti ra smin sanni
T02D1997:194b-43: hi to bha wa kro dha aagne ma ma sha
T02D1997:194b-44: tr'um m'a ra ya phat phat ces pas thab kyi
T02D1997:194b-45: g-yas phyogs su bzhag la dgug pa dang /
T02D1997:194b-49: khris kyi cho gas khrus byas te ;
T02D1997:194b-50: thab kyi dbus su bsam par bya'o //
T02D1997:194b-51: me lha'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1997:194b-52: de nas mchod yon la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1997:194b-53: gong nas gsungs pa'i rim pas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1997:195a-0: dgang blugs gsum mam bdun yungs @195a * //
T02D1997:195a-1: mar dang bcas pas zhal shin tu gdangs par dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1997:195a-3: aom aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la
T02D1997:195a-4: ya sarba bhasmim ku ru sarba dushta ma na che
T02D1997:195a-5: ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat ces bya bas
T02D1997:195a-6: dbul bar bya'o // de nas sreg blugs dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1997:195a-7: shing tsher ma can gyi yam shing sor drug pa
T02D1997:195a-8: kha dog nag po dang yungs mar la sogs pa'i
T02D1997:195a-9: rdzas rnams la sngags 'di bzlas te gsad pa'i las
T02D1997:195a-10: bya'o // aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri tr'a na na
T02D1997:195a-11: ma ma sha tr'um m'a ra ya h'um phat ces
T02D1997:195a-12: bya'o // gsad par bya'o // bhi de sha ya zhes pa ni dgar ba'o //
T02D1997:195a-13: autstsha ta ya zhes pa ni bskrad pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-14: mo ha na zhes pa ni rmongs pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-15: stam bha ya zhes pa ni rengs pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-16: aunma na da zhes pa ni smyo ba'o //
T02D1997:195a-17: a'a karsha ya dza: zhes pa ni dgug pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-18: rashta pa da sha ya zhes pa ni grong khyer dkrug pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-19: wa shim ku ru zhes pa ni dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D1997:195a-20: de dag rtsa ba'i sngags sam /
T02D1997:195a-23: gang yang rung bar bsngags la ming spel la /
T02D1997:195a-24: las thams cad bsgrub par bya zhing tha ma yang dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02D1997:195a-25: yang na bdun phul la mchod pa ni me lha mchod pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D1997:195a-26: 'jig rten pa'i me lha mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-27: de nas me lha de'i snying gar yang rung ste ;
T02D1997:195a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed ji skad du
T02D1997:195a-29: bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan du ldan pa
T02D1997:195a-30: bsgom pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1997:195a-31: yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las zhal dgu
T02D1997:195a-33: phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1997:195a-34: rtsa ba'i zhal ma he'i gdong can no //
T02D1997:195a-35: rva g-yas pa'i phyogs kyi zhal gsum ni sngon po dang /
T02D1997:195a-36: dmar po dang ser po shin tu khros par bya'o //
T02D1997:195a-37: rva g-yon pa'i phyogs kyi zhal gsum ni dkar po dang /
T02D1997:195a-40: rva gnyis kyi bar gyi zhal ni dmar po /
T02D1997:195a-41: de'i steng gi zhal ni ser ba cung zad tsam khro ba dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1997:195a-42: phyag g-yas pa rnams la gri gug dang /
T02D1997:195a-46: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02D1997:195b-2: phyag g-yon pa rnams la ni thod pa dang /
T02D1997:195b-18: phyag dang po gnyis kyis ni glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1997:195b-19: zhabs g-yas pa rnams kyis ni mi dang /
T02D1997:195b-27: zhabs g-yon pa rnams kyis ni bya rgod dang /
T02D1997:195b-34: khrung khrung rnams mnan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1997:195b-35: de nas sngags 'dis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs par bya ste /
T02D1997:195b-36: aom hr'i: bho bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha
T02D1997:195b-37: ya a'a gtstsha y'a sma da p'u dza pra ti
T02D1997:195b-38: grihna pra s'a dha me dhi man ku ru sha
T02D1997:195b-39: tr'um m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1997:195b-40: de nas gsang gtor byas la dgug pa dang /
T02D1997:195b-43: gnyis su med par bya ste /
T02D1997:195b-44: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1997:195b-45: de nas gong ma bzhin du mchod yon la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02D1997:195b-47: de nas yam shing la sogs pa 'bar ba'i rdzas
T02D1997:195b-48: rnams ni bsgrub bya'i rus pa yin par bsams ta
T02D1997:195b-49: / 'od 'bar ba la bsreg par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1997:195b-50: mar la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas ni bsgrub bya'i
T02D1997:195b-51: khrag yin par bsams te zhal du dbul bar bya'o
T02D1997:195b-52: // dri chen la sogs pa'i rdzas ni sha chen yin par bsams te phyag tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1997:195b-53: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1997:195b-59: da du ra dang bcas pa'i yungs mar gyi dgang blugs so //
T02D1997:195b-60: de nas sreg blugs kyi rim pa ni yam shing dang /
T02D1997:195b-65: mi rus kyi phye ma dang /
T02D1997:195b-70: rnga mo'i sbangs la sogs pa rnams las ling+ga byas la /
T02D1997:195b-71: de la bsgrub bya bsgoms la gri gug gis gtub
T02D1997:195b-72: te dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la dbul bar bya'o
T02D1997:196a-1: gsum ma ma bdun phul la mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1997:196a-2: dgang blugs kyi dus su ni gang 'dod pa'i dngos
T02D1997:196a-3: grub blang zhing me tog nag po las bsgrub par
T02D1997:196a-4: bya'o // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha mchod pa'o //
T02D1997:196a-5: de nas de kho na nyid las bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1997:196a-6: bsad pa la ni dug dang /
T02D1997:196a-11: da du ra rnams bsres la sngags dang spel nas bsreg pa'o //
T02D1997:196a-12: dpral ba ni bya rog dang /
T02D1997:196a-17: bskrad pa la ni bya rog gi sha'am /
T02D1997:196a-19: chang rnams lhan cig bsres pa'o //
T02D1997:196a-20: rmongs pa ni ldongs ros dang /
T02D1997:196a-23: go ro tsa na rnams sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1997:196a-24: rengs pa la ba bla dang /
T02D1997:196a-27: gi wang dang bcas pas bya'o //
T02D1997:196a-28: smyo bar bya ba la ni srin bya'i tshang dang /
T02D1997:196a-29: sha chen dang gnyis kyis bya'o //
T02D1997:196a-30: grong khyer dkrug pa la ni khyi dang /
T02D1997:196a-33: rnga mo mo gsham gyi spangs dang /
T02D1997:196a-34: byi la'i khrag rnams cha bsnyams te sbyar ba'i ri
T02D1997:196a-35: lu byas la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pas
T02D1997:196a-36: so // rgyal po dbang du bya ba la ni
T02D1997:196a-37: rta'i sha dri chen dang gnyis mnyam por sbyar bas
T02D1997:196a-38: so // so // tha mal pa dbang du bya
T02D1997:196a-39: ba la ni glang po che'i sha byang chub kyi
T02D1997:196a-41: bud med dbang du bya ba la ni nya'i sha dang chang rnams bsres pas so //
T02D1997:196a-42: dgug pa la ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas so //
T02D1997:196a-43: las rnams so sor bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1997:196a-44: de ltar las rnams bsgrubs zin nas ni dgang blugs
T02D1997:196a-45: phul la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de sngags 'dis
T02D1997:196a-46: gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
T02D1997:196a-47: aom dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shva r'u pa dha ri gtstsha gtstsha svasth'a /
T02D1997:196a-48: nam kri ta te ta th'a ga ta na ma:/
T02D1997:196a-49: sarba bh'u ta bi sardza ya ma ma karyam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1997:196a-50: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1997:196a-51: ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1997:196a-52: de nas rdzas lhag ma rnams me lha la phul
T02D1997:196a-53: la gnyug mar gnas pa'i me lha 'dir gshegs su
T02D1997:196a-55: aom khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D1997:196b-0: dngos grub ji bzhin @196b stsal lags kyis //
T02D1997:196b-1: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1997:196b-2: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1997:196b-4: 'jig rten pa'i me lha gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1997:196b-5: dam tshig bsdus te de nas nya dang sha rnam
T02D1997:196b-6: pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dpal gshin
T02D1997:196b-7: rje gshed 'khor dang bcas pa la byin nas g-yon
T02D1997:196b-8: phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te gnas par
T02D1997:196b-9: bya'o // de ltar de rnams byas las byung ba yi //
T02D1997:196b-10: dge ba gang des 'gro ba thams cad kun //
T02D1997:196b-11: sdig dang bral zhing dge ba rab 'phel nas //
T02D1997:196b-12: dpal ldan 'jigs byed de dang 'dra bar shog /
T02D1997:196b-13: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag po'i sbyin sreg
T02D1997:196b-14: gi cho ga aa mo gha badzra sa mdzad pa
